mapper.insert: insert into Register_Banner( ID, Banner_Title, Url, Links, Indexs, Opt_Id) values (#{id},#{bannerTitle},#{url},#{links},#{indexs}, #{optId})
mapper.select: select ID, Banner_Title, Url, Links, Indexs, Statu, CreateTime, Opt_Date, Opt_Id from Register_Banner where Banner_Title=#{bannerTitle} and ID !=#{id}
mapper.update:
update Register_Banner
Banner_Title=#{bannerTitle},
Url=#{url},
Links=#{links},
Opt_Id=#{optId},
Opt_Date=now() ,
where ID=#{id}
update Register_Banner set Statu=#{statu} where ID=#{id}
mapper.select: select ifnull(Indexs,0) from Register_Banner order by Indexs desc limit 1
select rb.ID, rb.Banner_Title, rb.Url, rb.Links, rb.Indexs, rb.Statu, rb.CreateTime, rb.Opt_Date, rb.Opt_Id from Register_Banner where rb.Statu =1
